quote: Its you against you everyday, make sure the right you wins.
author: Anonymous

quote: Today well lived makes every yesterday a dream of happiness, and every tomorrow a vision of hope.
author: Kalidasa

quote: Work could cure almost anything, I believed then, and I believe now.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The mature human being goes about doing what needs to be done regardless of whether that person feels great or terrible.
author: David K. Reynolds
